description: Fall in love with this Coral Queensland Limoncello cocktail's beautiful color and delicious taste. The Coral Queensland is a&nbsp;vodka-based cocktail made with a blend of lemonade, vodka, lemon liqueur (limoncello), blue liqueur (curacao) and served over ice in the&nbsp;glass of your choice.You don’t need to travel for hours to witness the beauty of the sea; one glass of this cocktail is enough to soothe your soul!
keywords: How To Make Coral Queensland Limoncello
name: Coral Queensland Limoncello

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all the ingredients except the garnishes and lemonade in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients except the garnishes and lemonade in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake vigorously until cold and strain into a glass with fresh ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake vigorously until cold and strain into a glass with fresh ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Top off with the lemonade and garnish.
recipeInstructions.text: Top off with the lemonade and garnish.
